question: Which of the following leaders were associated with Sawantwadi Revolt (1844)?
explanation:
The Sawantwadi Revolt (1844) was led by Maratha chief, Phond Sawant of Sawantwadi with the help of Anna Sahib. The rebels
captured forts in fighting the British but were finally forced to seek refuge in Goa. The rebellion came to end with the capture of the rebels.
